data.message: Friends have contacted me to say that my Facebook account has been cloned and they are receiving scam-type messages, supposedly from me.  I changed the password on my regular account, but i don't know what to do if it is a clone.

replies.message: Hey Carla. Please check out these tips if you believe your account is sending out spam: http://on.fb.me/1jKjma6. If you believe someone is impersonating you on Facebook, follow these steps to report it: http://on.fb.me/1jKjkyV. -Rey
